text: Ricardo Iván Rodríguez Araya (born 25 August 1992) is a Swiss football player. He plays as a left-back for Torino and the Switzerland national team. == References == Category:1992 births Category:Swiss footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:2014 FIFA World Cup players Category:UEFA Euro 2016 players Category:2018 FIFA World Cup players Category:Sportspeople from Zürich Category:Living people Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players
title: Ricardo Rodríguez (footballer)
